channel.title: Demo on Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Demo on Homepage

item.title: Use Case 1 Title
item.description: You can start using OpenBMP without any BGP feeds of your own. We provide you an application that downloads publicly available bgp data from RouteViews which you can immediately visualize using OpenBMP UI.

item.title: Examples
item.description: Below are some examples using both the OpenBMP UI and CLI command line mysql client.
